mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO, EMAIL, PASSWORD, USER_NAME, BELONG, AUTH, PHONE_1, PHONE_2, PHONE_3, REG_DT, REG_USER_NO, CHG_DT, CHG_USER_NO FROM USER_INFO;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO ( EMAIL, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, BELONG, PHONE_1, PHONE_2, PHONE_3, AUTH REG_USER_NO, REG_DT )VALUES( #{email}, #{user_name}, PASSWORD(#{password}), #{belong}, #{phone_1}, #{phone_2}, #{phone_3}, 'U', last_insert_id(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO, USER_NAME, AUTH, EMAIL FROM USER_INFO WHERE EMAIL=#{email} AND PASSWORD = PASSWORD(#{password})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_INFO WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
